name: SimpleStealthGame
description:
Run around with a friend in multiplayer trying to solve stealth game puzzles. All you have to do is distract the guards and escape with the objective. Now the only question is can you?

Please note this game is in very early access! This project is being developed by one developer, any help with the development process is greatly appreciated. If you enjoy what you are playing please support me and follow my GitHub for updates, https://github.com/lhurt51. If you find any bugs or have problems downloading please make an issue on GitHub or contact me on my email liamhurt51@gmail.com.
